title: Ecological risk of metals in Andean water resources: A framework for early environmental assessment of mining projects in Peru
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Simón B. Moreno-Aguirre, Jacinto J. Vértiz-Osores, Christian E. Paredes-Espinal, Enrique Meseth, Guillermo L. Vílchez-Ochoa, Jessica A. Espino-Ciudad, Lisveth Flores del Pino
